Name: abrasive blasting, alumina, carbon steel substrate | abrasive blasting, alumina, carbon steel substrate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2592:Treatment and coating of metals; machining
Description: The machine is manually operated, and it provides a working volume of 591x815x560 [mm]. The abrasive considered for this activity is alumina powder. Considering the specificity of the activity, this activity should be used only for the preparation of the workpieces for thermal spray coating.;The machine uses compressed air with a gauge pressure of 550 kPa. This dataset is considered to be valid for a carbon steel substrate.;The alumina is considered to be reused. The calculation is based on the condition of the pilot plant: 100g of alumina reused for 100 50x20mm specimens.
